subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks acquired the standout defenseman Dan Boyle from Tampa Bay, trading defenseman Matt Carle and the top prospect Ty Wishart to the Lightning to acquire their second proven N.H.L. defensive star in two days.
snippet: The San Jose Sharks acquired the standout defenseman Dan Boyle from Tampa Bay, trading defenseman Matt Carle and the top prospect Ty Wishart to the Lightning to acquire their second proven N.H.L. defensive star in two days.
